title: Yutao Sun and Seamus Grimes, “China and Global Value Chains” (Routledge, 2018)
description:
Today I was joined by Seamus Grimes from Ireland where he is Emeritus Professor at the National University of Ireland, Galway. With Yutao Sun (Dalian University of Technology), he just published a very interesting and timely book China and Global Value Chains: Globalization and the Information and Communications Technology Sector...
